https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mmvFokJgpFmNt522Hfpq3Zfs2Ra.jpg Loosely based on a 17th century erotic Chinese story named The Carnal Prayer Mat, the story follows a young scholar named Yangsheng who gets married to the beautiful daughter of a local merchant. When their sex life proves unsatisfactory, Yangsheng leaves home and journeys to the Pavilion of Ultimate Bliss. 3-D Sex and Zen: Extreme Ecstasy
